case_data.name: Ferguson Reorganized School District v. United States of America
case_data.summary: [This summary is temporary while we research the case.] This is a lawsuit related to a proposed desegregation plan for the school districts in St. Louis County. The case was filed on September 3, 1971, in the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Missouri.
